validate(JTextComponent) - Method in class fs.polyglot.validate.NonEmptyWarner
Returns WARNING, if the content is the empty string (after trimming) (or the component is null) and CORRECT otherwise
validate(JTextComponent) - Method in class fs.polyglot.validate.TabooValidator
Returns CORRECT, if the TextFields content is not in the taboo list (after trimming of whitespaces) and, if canBeEmpty has been set to false, if it isn't empty (after trimming).
validate() - Method in class fs.validate.AbstractComponentValidator
Calls AbstractComponentValidator.validate(Object) on all registered components and returns CORRECT as overall result, if and only if all these calls return CORRECT.
validate(T) - Method in class fs.validate.AbstractComponentValidator
Validates the content of the given component and returns whether it is 'correct'
validate() - Method in interface fs.validate.ComponentValidator
Validates all registered components and returns 'true' as overall result, if the content of all components is correct.
validate() - Method in class fs.validate.LabelIndicValidator
Runs a validation on all registered components and will set the icons of the associated labels accordingly.
validate() - Method in class fs.validate.ValidationValidator
Calculates the overall validation status and calls calculateResult;

This validates an xml source according to a scheme using the standard java SAX parser and validation implementations
validateXML(Node, Schema) - Static method in class fs.xml.XMLToolbox
This validates an already existent XML node according to a scheme using the standard java SAX parser and validation implementations.
